page.title: 12Activity groups and clubs.
page.content: Several clubs and groups meet regularly in the villages in our block. The older people in the area belong to the Wednesday club which meets each week.They play whist and have tea.Sometimes they go on outings. The Country Womens Association meets each month.They have speakers and discussions.The young people have a youth club which meets in the village hall.They play games and listen to records.The Bainton Young Farmers meet in Lund.They have talks and go on visits.There is a pony club in Lockington.The children practise games and try to improve their riding.A house group meets at the rectory for bible study and prayer.The Workers Educational Association hold lectures in Lockington School and Lund village hall.
